Each regional version of ''FIFA 11'' features different players on the cover. [[KakÃ¡]] will be featured on the cover globally.<ref>http://kotaku.com/5605780/kaka-is-fifa-11s-worldwide-cover-athlete</ref> The [[United Kingdom]] and [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]] covers feature KakÃ¡ and [[Wayne Rooney]]; the [[Australia]]n cover features KakÃ¡, Wayne Rooney, and [[Tim Cahill]];<ref>http://www.kotaku.com.au/2010/08/fifa-11-box-art-puts-tim-cahill-at-centre-forward/</ref> and the [[North America]]n version features KakÃ¡, [[Carlos Vela]], and [[Landon Donovan]].<ref>http://www.crunchgear.com/2010/08/12/american-hero-landon-donovan-on-north-american-cover-of-fifa-11-along-with-kaka-carlos-vela/</ref> and in the Italian version will feature KakÃ¡ with Juventus's defender [[Giorgio Chiellini]], <ref>http://fifa.easports.com/itIT/itIT/news.action?id=fifa11pack</ref>, the Spanish cover will feature KakÃ¡ and [[Andres Iniesta]].<ref>http://www.ea.com/es/noticias/kaka-acompanara-a-iniesta-en-la-portada-de-fifa-11-en-espana</ref>
+
Each regional version of ''FIFA 11'' features different players on the cover. [[KakÃ¡]] will be featured on the cover globally.<ref>http://kotaku.com/5605780/kaka-is-fifa-11s-worldwide-cover-athlete</ref> The '''''[[United Kingdom]] and [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]]''''' covers feature KakÃ¡ and [[Wayne Rooney]]; the '''''[[Australia]]n''''' cover features KakÃ¡, Wayne Rooney, and [[Tim Cahill]];<ref>http://www.kotaku.com.au/2010/08/fifa-11-box-art-puts-tim-cahill-at-centre-forward/</ref> and the '''''[[North America]]n''''' version features KakÃ¡, [[Carlos Vela]], and [[Landon Donovan]].<ref>http://www.crunchgear.com/2010/08/12/american-hero-landon-donovan-on-north-american-cover-of-fifa-11-along-with-kaka-carlos-vela/</ref> and in the '''''[[Italy|Italian''''' version will feature KakÃ¡ with Juventus's defender [[Giorgio Chiellini]], <ref>http://fifa.easports.com/itIT/itIT/news.action?id=fifa11pack</ref>, the '''''[[Spain|Spanish]]''''' cover will feature KakÃ¡ and [[Andres Iniesta]].<ref>http://www.ea.com/es/noticias/kaka-acompanara-a-iniesta-en-la-portada-de-fifa-11-en-espana</ref>
